title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\V1beta1\Cursor
name: Cursor
description:
A position in a query result set.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.v1beta1.Cursor

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.values
params.description: The values that represent a position, in the order they appear in the order by clause of a query. Can contain fewer values than specified in the order by clause.

params.name: data.before
params.description: If the position is just before or just after the given values, relative to the sort order defined by the query.
